title: Web Receipt v1
description: Witness-signed receipt for web/subscription model interactions (e.g. hosted chat UIs). Distinct from gateway API receipts.

source.description: Web interaction surface the witness observed.

request_hash_b64u.description: SHA-256 hash of the witnessed request bytes (base64url).

response_hash_b64u.description: SHA-256 hash of the witnessed response bytes (base64url).

session_hash_b64u.description: Optional hash pointer to witnessed browser/session state.

metadata.description: Optional metadata for non-sensitive witness context.
